author: Aaron Edwards
title: A Lament for the Church of England: Crying Female Bishops and the Ecclesial Harm of Feminism
text:
At a recent Anglican Synod, the Bishop of London, Sarah Mullaly, broke down in tears.
Why was the Bishop of London moved to tears? Was it because of the utter lack of faith in so many modern churches? Was it because of the catastrophic decline of the Church of England in our time? Or was it due to the hundreds of thousands of aborted babies every year in the very nation to which that Church is called? None of the above. She was moved to tears because of ‚Äúmicro-aggressions‚Äù and ‚Äúinstitutional barriers‚Äù against women within the Church of England.
‚ÄúI would love to encourage women,‚Äù she said , ‚Äúwhich I do all the time. But there continues to be institutional barriers. We continue to experience micro-aggression‚Ä¶‚Äù It was at that point that she broke down in tears, after which she was lavishly applauded by the well-groomed crowd.
It‚Äôs difficult to describe just what those culturally Marxist terms of the Zeitgeist communicate at such a time as this. This is, after all, a time in which women are ‚Äúpermitted‚Äù to teach and exercise authority over men in the church as preachers, vicars, and even as bishops, with many even calling for a first female archbishop .
Never in the history of its existence has the Church of England been more influenced by the rule of women, and never in the history of its existence has the Church of England been more at risk of collapse. Yet it is the apparent ongoing raft of subjective ‚Äúmicro-aggressions‚Äù against women deemed to be the greatest cause of ecclesial harm.
I wonder, then, whether the bishop might class it as a ‚Äúmacro-aggression‚Äù if I suggested that her very response‚Äîwhether a symptom of her own ideological delusion or a subtler form of emotional sabotage ‚Äîshows why we need not fewer institutional barriers against women in the Church, but more?
The Problem with Feminist ‚ÄúProgress‚Äù We might start with the very barrier Mullaly so rudely stepped over in order to become a bishop in the first place, continuing the pattern of Anglican apostasy which seeks to justify their fundamental embarrassment of the Bible‚Äôs representation of women to the feminists of this world, whom they have so desperately sought to impress for so long.
Read it all in That Good Fight

author: nenos50865
title: Choosing the Right Residential Surveyors in Cheshire: A Guide for Buyers
text:
When embarking on the experience of getting a home, one pivotal step is selecting a residential surveyor in Cheshire. The myriad of options offered may be overwhelming, but this guide seeks to streamline the process for homebuyers, delivering insights and tips on finding the perfect surveyor to meet your preferences. Have more information about
Residential Surveyors Heswall
Understanding the Role of Residential Surveyors
Just before delving into the selection process, it‚Äôs essential to know the role of residential surveyors. These experts play a vital role in evaluating a property‚Äôs condition, from architectural reliability to probable problems. Their observations are crucial for making informed decisions.
The Importance of Local Experience
Prioritize surveyors with local skills when picking a residential surveyor in Cheshire. Cheshire‚Äôs unique landscape and architectural styles call for a nuanced with the knowledge that just a local surveyor provides. Their familiarity with local restrictions and common problems can find hidden information ignored by somebody new to the area.
Skills Matter
In the world of surveying, requirements are important. Look for surveyors who definitely are members of accepted skilled body to make certain a certain normal of professionalism and adherence to moral guidelines.
Kinds of Surveys Supplied
Residential surveyors provide various surveys, each and every catering to distinct needs. Common surveys include Homebuyer Studies and Building Surveys. Learning the variations and deciding on the one best suited for your demands is crucial. A Homebuyer Report could be enough for more recent properties, while more aged or alternative constructions might benefit far more coming from a thorough Building Survey.
Reviews and Testimonials
In the digital age, accessing reviews and testimonials has never been simpler. Focus on surveyors with positive feedback, and don‚Äôt wait to ask for references. Personal experience from earlier clients may offer useful ideas right into a surveyor‚Äôs professionalism, communication, and the thoroughness of the studies.
Transparency in Costs
Very clear and translucent prices are suggestive of an established surveyor. Prior to fascinating their services, have a in depth breaking down of costs. Be skeptical of hidden fees that may surprise you later in the process. A trustworthy surveyor will give you a comprehensive quote masking all aspects of your survey.
Turnaround Time
Time is often of the essence in property purchases. Inquire about the surveyor‚Äôs turnaround time for providing reports. A balance should be smacked between a detailed assessment and prompt delivery. A surveyor who can give a thorough report promptly is really a beneficial asset inside a very competitive real estate market.
Individualized Strategy
Every property is unique, and also the challenges it offers may differ. Choose a surveyor who has a individualized technique, tailoring their services for your distinct requires. This makes sure that the survey is centered on the factors that matter most to you as being a homebuyer.
Technology Incorporation
Advancements in technology have increased the surveying process. Pick a surveyor who holds technology to get more exact and effective evaluations. Tools such as drones and 3D imaging can provide a more in-depth idea of a property‚Äôs condition.
Insurance and Liability
Lastly, but most certainly not minimum, ensure that the surveyor has correct insurance and liability coverage. This guards you in case of errors or omissions with their records. An established surveyor can have skilled indemnity insurance, offering you satisfaction through the home-buying process.
Verdict
Choosing the right residential surveyor in Cheshire is a crucial step in the home-buying quest. By prioritizing local skills, credentials, along with a individualized technique, you can ensure a comprehensive and reliable assessment of the would-be property. Reading reviews, comprehending rates structures, and adopting technology are further steps that contribute to a well-informed choice. Bear in mind, investing time in selecting the right surveyor can save you from possible problems and give self-confidence within your property obtain.

author: Amanda Idleman
title: 4 Lies the Enemy Uses against Us from Genesis
text:
4 Lies the Enemy Uses against Us from Genesis
Share
‚ÄúHuman history is the long, terrible story of man trying to find something other than God which will make him happy.‚Äù - C.S. Lewis
There are so many lies we buy into in an effort to find joy outside of a surrendered relationship with God. Genesis introduces sin, and in Genesis 3 we read the account of an interaction between the deceiver and the woman. This conversation reveals the lies that started humanity's long stint of wandering.
‚ÄúNow the serpent was more crafty than any of the wild animals the Lord God had made. He said to the woman, ‚ÄòDid God really say, ‚ÄòYou must not eat from any tree in the garden‚Äô?‚Äô The woman said to the serpent, ‚ÄòWe may eat fruit from the trees in the garden, but God did say, ‚ÄòYou must not eat fruit from the tree that is in the middle of the garden, and you must not touch it, or you will die.‚Äô‚Äô ‚ÄòYou will not certainly die,‚Äô the serpent said to the woman. ‚ÄòFor God knows that when you eat from it your eyes will be opened, and you will be like God, knowing good and evil.‚Äô When the woman saw that the fruit of the tree was good for food and pleasing to the eye, and also desirable for gaining wisdom, she took some and ate it. She also gave some to her husband, who was with her, and he ate it. Then the eyes of both of them were opened, and they realized they were naked; so they sewed fig leaves together and made coverings for themselves‚Äù (Genesis 3:1-7, emphasis added).
In this passage of Scripture, we notice four lies the serpent uses to pull the first humans away from God‚Äôs best.
Photo credit: ¬©Getty Images/lchumpitaz
Amanda Idleman is a writer whose passion is to encourage others to live joyfully. She writes devotions for My Daily Bible Verse Devotional and Podcast, Crosswalk Couples Devotional, the Daily Devotional App, she has work published with Her View from Home, on the MOPS Blog, and is a regular contributor for Crosswalk.com. She has most recently published a devotional, Comfort: A 30 Day Devotional Exploring God's Heart of Love for Mommas. You can find out more about Amanda on her Facebook Page or follow her on Instagram.

author: Fracture Media Syndicate
title: All Blacks reveal Beauden Barrett headed for X-ray after training injury
text:
Feyi-Waboso returns as England change 12 for USA with 6 debutants
Beauden Barrett‚Äôs status for the third and final All Blacks Test against France has been confirmed by his absence from the team naming, and there‚Äôs potential it won‚Äôt be the only Test the centurion misses.
A hand injury has sidelined the 34-year-old for the coming week, but further tests are needed to determine the extent of the damage.
Barrett suffered a broken hand partway through the 2025 Super Rugby Pacific season, and it is again his right hand that was strapped up at All Blacks training on Thursday.
At the team naming press conference, All Blacks head coach Scott Robertson confirmed the injury had been sustained at training.
‚ÄúI‚Äôm not a doctor, but it was a little bit puffy,‚Äù Robertson said. ‚ÄúSo, we looked after him.‚Äù
‚ÄúHe was an option to play, he was considered, but we just want to look after him.‚Äù
The Rugby Championship kicks off in one month‚Äôs time with the All Blacks facing Los Pumas in C√≥rdoba. Should the hand injury be another break, Barrett would certainly be in doubt for that campaign opener.
The expected recovery period for a broken hand is six to eight weeks, a timeline that would put Barrett in doubt to play the Springboks at Eden Park.
The playmaker wasn‚Äôt the only one watching All Blacks training on Thursday, with Tupou Vaa‚Äôi (concussion) running through individual training work and team captain, Scott Barrett, offering some mentorship as he nurses a calf injury.
Ankle injuries have also befallen Caleb Clarke and Wallace Sititi, while Tamaiti Williams has a knee complaint.
Is it really the 'All Black way' to move Vaa'i, a stand-out lock forward, to the back-row when other hybrid options may be better suited to the role?
The good news for the All Blacks is the respective returns of Tyrel Lomax, Luke Jacobson, and Anton Lienert-Brown, who have each missed the series to date with injuries. Sevu Reece is also back in black, having missed all but the first minute of the series with a concussion.
Robertson was thrilled to have so many of his troops back on deck and bringing experience to a new-look matchday 23.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs good. Tyrel was 50/50 last week to play. There were some scrummaging sessions where, I tell you what, he definitely let us know he‚Äôs available.
‚ÄúAnd the likes of Anton, 80-odd Tests, hell of an experienced player, just what you need in games like this; the third of a three-match series and just as important as the first to us.‚Äù
News, stats, videos and more! Download the new RugbyPass app, in collaboration with the British and Irish Lions, on the App Store (iOS) and Google Play (Android) now!
Join free and tell us what you really think!
Is it really the 'All Black way' to move Vaa'i, a stand-out lock forward, to the back-row when other hybrid options may be better suited to the role?
The gruelling and engrossing league is the lifeblood of French rugby, rather than the national team's summer voyages south of the equator.
By analysing combinations used across key positions, we might just be able to read the tea leaves and predict the squad for the opening Test in Australia.

author: SUNDY LOCUS, GMA Integrated News
title: Mindanao violent incidents in an uptrend since 2021 ‚Äîstudy | GMA News Online
text:
recent study by the Council for Climate and Conflict Action Asia (CCAA) showed that incidents of violence have been increasing in Mindanao since 2021, which may have an impact on next year's local elections.
In its Conflict Alert Triennial 2021-2023 Report, the CCAA warned that this may affect the peace and security situation in the region during the upcoming 2025 May elections and the Bangsamoro parliamentary polls.
According to the study, among the factors contributing to the growing violence is the proliferation of illicit drugs and illegal firearms in the shadow economy.
Also affecting the peace situation in the region is identity-related violence, which includes clan feuding over land and political office, persistent extremist violence, as well as violent political contestation.
‚ÄúThe main causes of deaths between the years 2011-2023 were identity conflicts,‚Äù said CCAA Trustee Nikki del Rosario.
‚ÄúWe classify identity conflict, usually the incident is combined with violent extremism...Kaya mataas 'yung incidents of deaths because the manifestations of identity conflict are clan feuding, violent extremism, non-Moro Indigenous People-related (NMIP) conflicts,‚Äù said del Rosario.
(The death incidents were high because the manifestations of identity conflict are clan feuding, violent extremism, non-Moro Indigenous People-related (NMIP) conflicts.)
‚ÄúUsually identity conflicts are combined with other causes. In most cases, it's political combined with shadow economies,‚Äù she added.
Extremists
Meanwhile, the study showed that violent incidents were concentrated in areas under the Bangsamoro government, particularly Lanao del Sur and Maguindanao provinces.
This is due to the vertical assaults from extremists and insurgents as well as the horizontal assault stemming from the schisms between Moro Islamic Liberation Front (MILF) members, it added.
‚ÄúWe're receiving data of people getting killed and the numbers were increasing and were only halfway of 2024. Our numbers are reaching nearly the incidents of the entire 2023. You still have 2025 elections,‚Äù said Lara.
Aside from increased violence, the research also said there may also be deaths and displacements multiply among vulnerable sectors including NMIPs, and intensified internal armed struggles involving MILF, Moro National Liberation Front, Bangsamoro Islamic Freedom Fighters, Dawlah Islamiya, and the Communist Party of the Philippines-New People‚Äôs Army-National Democratic Front.
It also said coordinated and cooperative armed attacks against state forces may likely increase and the links between illicit drugs, weapons, and electoral campaigns may become stronger.
To mitigate the conflict, the research said there should be an ‚Äúall hands-on-deck‚Äù approach for the 2025 elections including mediating of violent and longstanding feuds, redundant and autonomous monitoring of systems and organizations, as well as collaborative responses from the media.
In conducting the study, the CCAA used police and media reports to gather violent conflict data in five provinces of the Bangsamoro region. It also utilized a multi-stakeholder Validation Group, which was composed of members from diverse backgrounds, with local knowledge of violent conflict in the areas covered by conflict alert. ‚ÄîVAL, GMA Integrated News

author: Webedia Brand Services
title: OPPO lanza Find N5: el tel√©fono plegable de tipo libro m√°s delgado del mundo con un dise√±o sin...
text:
OPPO, la marca l√≠der mundial de dispositivos inteligentes, anunci√≥ la disponibilidad en M√©xico de su smartphone plegable insignia Find N5. Este dispositivo redefine la excelencia de los tel√©fonos plegables, ya que ofrece experiencias inigualables con su dise√±o delgado y liviano, la pantalla interna m√°s grande de cualquier dispositivo plegable de tipo libro, una duraci√≥n de bater√≠a l√≠der en su clase y un rendimiento impulsado por IA de √∫ltima generaci√≥n.
‚ÄúEl Find N5 libera el potencial de los tel√©fonos plegables, poniendo en nuestras manos la experiencia de una tableta o una computadora port√°til. Es incre√≠blemente delgado y liviano, y ColorOS 15 est√° ajustado con precisi√≥n para hacer m√°s en dos pantallas inmersivas con herramientas impulsadas por IA e integraci√≥n avanzada con Mac. El dispositivo no cierra puertas, las abre, desplegando el potencial de toda tu tecnolog√≠a mientras te mantiene conectado todo el d√≠a y m√°s all√°‚Äù, menciona Pete Lau, SVP y director de productos de OPPO.
Delgado, Ligero y Duradero
El Find N5 es el tel√©fono plegable de tipo libro m√°s delgado del mundo cuando est√° cerrado. Con tan solo 8.93 mm, no es m√°s grueso que un tel√©fono tradicional y, con un peso pluma de 229 g, es incre√≠blemente ligero. Su dise√±o de primera calidad y su tacto agradable se combinan con los laterales planos para crear un agarre seguro, con metal contorneado y peso equilibrado para una sujeci√≥n personalizada como ninguna otra.
Elija entre dos opciones de color Find N5: Negro Gal√°ctico, que combina un acabado negro esmerilado cl√°sico y recatado con un marco de metal negro mate maduro. Mientras que el color Blanco Niebla brilla al momento que la parte posterior, rica en capas, capta la luz y su marco plateado brilla de manera tentadora.
Hermoso y duradero, el Find N5 es el primer dispositivo plegable con clasificaci√≥n IPX9 del mundo. Adem√°s de su resistencia al agua IPX8, ha sido probada para soportar chorros de agua a temperaturas extremas.
La arquitectura Escudo de Armadura de OPPO fortalece la integridad estructural del Find N5. El marco est√° fabricado con un compuesto de aleaci√≥n de aluminio de la serie 7000, lo que aumenta un 30% su resistencia. Con un Vidrio Nanocristalino Ultradelgado, la pantalla de la cubierta se beneficia de una mejora de hasta un 20% en la resistencia a las ca√≠das.
Suave y Segura: la Bisagra Flexible de Aleaci√≥n de Titanio de OPPO
La durabilidad de clase mundial del Find N5 se extiende a su Bisagra Flexible de Titanio, que es un 26% m√°s peque√±a pero un 36% m√°s r√≠gida que la generaci√≥n anterior, gracias a una estructura renovada y materiales mejorados.
Esta estructura se desliza suavemente al abrirla y cerrarla, mientras que los lados planos y contorneados crean un agarre perfecto. Con la certificaci√≥n de plegado confiable de T√úV Rheinland, el Find N5 se prueba en entornos extremos para brindar la m√°xima tranquilidad.
Dos Pantallas Grandes
Con 8.12 pulgadas cuando est√° abierto, el Find N5 tiene la pantalla interna m√°s grande de cualquier plegable de tipo libro, y cuando est√° cerrado, la pantalla de cubierta de 6.62 pulgadas y 20.7:9 es expansiva, familiar y c√≥moda.
A pesar de su dise√±o delgado y de bolsillo, la pantalla desplegada de 8.12‚Äù es m√°s grande que la de algunas tabletas populares del mercado. Crea una funcionalidad dos en uno y te da espacio para una productividad, creatividad y entretenimiento de nivel superior. Y con un pliegue angosto y poco profundo l√≠der en su clase, te invita a fluir mientras navegas por √©l, sin interrupciones. El Find N5 tambi√©n es el primer tel√©fono inteligente en obtener la Certificaci√≥n de Pliegue Minimizado de T√úV Rheinland, lo que consolida a√∫n m√°s su estatus de l√≠der en la industria.
Las dos pantallas del Find N5 se ven geniales y brindan un cuidado avanzado de la vista. Muestran contenido con una claridad de m√°s de 400 PPP, se deslizan con una frecuencia de actualizaci√≥n suave de 1 a 120 Hz y emiten con un brillo m√°ximo de m√°s de 2000 nits cuando muestran contenido HDR, por lo que las aplicaciones, los juegos y las pel√≠culas se ven sensacionales, ya sea abiertas o cerradas.
La Mejor Duraci√≥n de Bater√≠a de Cualquier Plegable
Este smartphone dura m√°s y ofrece la mejor bater√≠a de cualquier tel√©fono plegable. Gracias a su bater√≠a de doble celda de 5600 mAh de capacidad ultraalta, establece un nuevo est√°ndar, ya que dura m√°s de un d√≠a completo y supera a la competencia tanto plegable como no plegable.
Esta innovadora duraci√≥n de bater√≠a solo es posible con la bater√≠a de silicio-carbono de √∫ltima generaci√≥n de OPPO, que cuenta con un 10% de silicio l√≠der en la industria, lo que da como resultado una celda incre√≠blemente delgada de 2,1 mm a pesar de su capacidad l√≠der en su clase.
A diferencia de la competencia plegable, el Find N5 no sacrifica la velocidad de carga gracias a la carga SUPERVOOCTM de 80 W y la AIRVOOCTM de 50 W, ofrece horas de uso con solo unos minutos de carga. Cuando se combina con una funda magn√©tica OPPO, el tel√©fono puede disfrutar de una carga inal√°mbrica AIRVOOCTM de 50 W de alta velocidad con la comodidad de la carga y el montaje magn√©ticos.
Poder, Privacidad y Fotograf√≠a
El Find N5, es el primer dispositivo plegable que se lanza con una plataforma m√≥vil Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite, cuenta con un rendimiento, una computaci√≥n de IA y una eficiencia excepcionales. La NPU Hexagon ofrece una mejora del 45% en el rendimiento de la IA, mientras que la arquitectura de 3 nm de segunda generaci√≥n garantiza que la bater√≠a de alta capacidad dure a√∫n m√°s.
El Find N5 abre nuevas posibilidades con su Sistema de C√°mara Master Hasselblad. Al combinar una c√°mara ultra gran angular para vistas amplias, una c√°mara principal gran angular para tomas multiprop√≥sito y zoom 2x sin p√©rdida, y una potente c√°mara perisc√≥pica para fotos y videos de largo alcance, Find N5 es una herramienta creativa vers√°til.
A pesar de su perfil ultradelgado, la C√°mara Perisc√≥pica del Find N5 combina un sensor de 50 MP de alta resoluci√≥n con una distancia focal de 70 mm, una r√°pida apertura de f/2.7 y OIS. Al desbloquear la captura macro con telefoto, enfoca un sujeto a una distancia de hasta 10 cm del lente, lo que ofrece la posibilidad de tomar fotograf√≠as con telemacro por primera vez en un dispositivo OPPO, por lo que, ya sea que est√©s fotografiando alimentos, flores, insectos o productos, este tel√©fono ofrece una imagen n√≠tida.
Experiencias ultrainteligentes en Pantalla Grande
El Find N5 se lanzar√° con Android 15, recibir√° cinco a√±os de actualizaciones de seguridad para una tranquilidad duradera y estar√° impulsado por ColorOS 15, brindando la √∫ltima generaci√≥n de experiencias OPPO y capacidades de inteligencia artificial a los dispositivos plegables.
Con la nueva funci√≥n de traducci√≥n e interpretaci√≥n en dos pantallas del Find N5 y la pr√°ctica compatibilidad con eSIM, es el compa√±ero ideal para los viajeros por el mundo. Simplemente abre la Aplicaci√≥n Traductor, activa el int√©rprete en dos pantallas, dobla el tel√©fono y empieza a hablar para que cada hablante pueda ver la traducci√≥n en vivo. El Find N5 derriba las barreras del idioma en segundos.
ColorOS 15 tambi√©n presenta Circle to Search de Google. Simplemente haz un c√≠rculo para buscar cualquier cosa en tu tel√©fono, sin cambiar de aplicaci√≥n. Y con la aplicaci√≥n Google Gemini, tu asistente de inteligencia artificial de Google, puedes obtener ayuda para aprender de nuevas maneras, escribir correos electr√≥nicos, planificar eventos y m√°s.
OPPO cierra la brecha entre las computadoras MacOS y el Find N5
Con la aplicaci√≥n O+ Connect para Mac instalada, puedes compartir fotos, videos y archivos sin problemas y a una velocidad superr√°pida entre dispositivos. O+ Connect incluso admite acceso remoto, por lo que puedes transferir archivos f√°cilmente desde tu computadora a tu Find N5 de forma remota o tomar el control de la interfaz de tu Mac cuando est√°s de viaje y tu Mac est√° a kil√≥metros de distancia.
Toca para Compartir presentado en la serie Find X8, tambi√©n permite compartir y recibir con un solo toque desde dispositivos iOS y iPadOS con su tel√©fono inteligente ColorOS.
Disponibilidad y Precio del OPPO Find N5
El OPPO Find N5 est√° disponible en dos colores: Negro Gal√°ctico y Blanco Niebla, con 16GB + 512GB a un precio de 44,999 MXN.

title: ¬°M√©xico tiene nueva medalla! Gilda Cota consigue plata en impulso de bala en Par√≠s 2024 - El Sol de M√©xico | Noticias, Deportes, Gossip, Columnas
text:
Una vez m√°s la Delegaci√≥n Mexicana regal√≥ un momento de emoci√≥n con una nueva medalla en los Juegos Paral√≠mpicos . La paratleta Gilda Cota logr√≥ la presea de plata en la disciplina de impulso de bala de Par√≠s 2024.
La paradeportista mexicana lleg√≥ con expectativas muy altas a la competencia, ya que es la poseedora del r√©cord mundial. La azteca registr√≥ un lanzamiento de 8.23m en abril del 2024, por lo que la medalla se esperaba.
Luego de varios lanzamientos, la mexicana registr√≥ su mejor marca en la final de Par√≠s 2024 con un 7.89m. A pesar de su gran lanzamiento, la mexicana fue superada por la paratleta de China Qing Wu, quien marc√≥ 7.98. De hecho, la representante asi√°tica, impuso un nuevo r√©cord paral√≠mpico.
